channel.title: Comments on: Beauty Queen Asked To Resign From Her Jobs For Being Too Pretty…
channel.description: Your source for the latest trends in business, Technology, Marketing, Lifestyle, Candid Vibez, Energy, and Health. With our fresh perspective and innovative approach, we bring you the insights and inspiration you need to thrive and be more productive in today's fast-paced world. Join our community and start creating the future you want today wherever you find yourself!

item.title: By: Anim Darko
item.dc:creator: Anim Darko
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2021/02/21/beauty-queen-asked-to-resign-from-her-jobs-for-being-too-pretty/#comment-30">Wisdom T</a>.
That's true, Wisdom T. After 1990, equality for gender (female) rights started declining. It's so sad that things like that had to happen.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Wisdom T.

That’s true, Wisdom T. After 1990, equality for gender (female) rights started declining. It’s so sad that things like that had to happen.

item.title: By: Wisdom T
item.dc:creator: Wisdom T
item.description:
Waoo, strange world where beauty is now a threat. We need to be unkept to keep jobs. This is a sad paradox or unfunny irony. This is a call for interprenuership.
I believe this strategies for doing away with employees is unfair, embarrassing and not encouraging. This is a gender bias issue
item.content:encoded:
Waoo, strange world where beauty is now a threat. We need to be unkept to keep jobs. This is a sad paradox or unfunny irony. This is a call for interprenuership.

I believe this strategies for doing away with employees is unfair, embarrassing and not encouraging. This is a gender bias issue
